about_the_game:
Retro Futuristic Arcade Fun


Take on swarms of evil aliens known as the galactoids in this action-packed retro-styled arcade shoot 'em up. Inspired by the original arcade classics with the same easy-to-learn gameplay, mixed up with modern 2D visuals. Have you got what it takes to complete "Galactoids - Galactic Invaders"?

Battle swarms of alien fighters and giant bosses, set over 12 massive stages, before a final showdown with a massive Boss Stage. The stages get progressively harder and more challenging. Play the game challenges to unlock pick-ups and other goodies. Boost your score with bonus waves and bonus challenge stages.

Galactoids - Galactic Invaders includes


"Galactoids - Galactic Invaders" - Arcade version starting with 3 lives.

"Galacteroids" - Challenge Game - Stranded in deep space trapped in a wormhole, surrounded by a never-ending amount of Galactoids. Shoot & Destroy or get destroyed. At least you have weapons. Unlock pickups in "Galactoids - Galactic Invaders" and rank your online high score.

"Flappy Galactoids" - Challenge Game - Fly your little Galactoid between the pipes collecting the pickups. You get one life to score as much as you can get to unlock pickups for "Galactoids - Galactic Invaders" Rank your online score.

"Two Player Shootout". "Two Player Skillshot" & "The Nerdcon Challenge" - local 2-player games. Compete with a friend to find out just who really is the best.

"The Nerdcon Challenge" is a special two-player game (In English) that was specially made for the first-ever Nerdcon event in the UK at "The Arcade Club" in Bury, UK. The game featured the creators and hosts on Nerdcon "Mr. Brad Burton" & "Mr. Paul Spicer" Twitch's "Middle Aged Gamer Guy".


The game also features an amazing soundtrack by "The Amazing Teknoaxe".

May the "Nerd" be with you.
